# NovaSR - Quick Setup Guide

## üìÅ Model Folder Structure

Create this folder in your ComfyUI installation:

```
ComfyUI/
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ models/
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ NovaSR/
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pytorch_model.bin
        ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ NovaSR.safetensors
```

## üì• Download Models

| Model | Download Link | Format | Size |
|-------|---------------|---------|-------|
| PyTorch | [pytorch_model.bin](https://huggingface.co/drbaph/NovaSR/resolve/main/pytorch_model.bin) | .bin | 53.2 KB |
| SafeTensors | [NovaSR.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/drbaph/NovaSR/resolve/main/NovaSR.safetensors) | .safetensors | 48 KB |

**[‚Üí View all models on HuggingFace](https://huggingface.co/drbaph/NovaSR/tree/main)**

**Note:** Both formats contain the same model. Choose the one you prefer. SafeTensors is more secure and widely recommended.


## ‚öôÔ∏è Node Parameters

| Parameter | Value | Description |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| Audio | *(input)* | Connect Load Audio node output |
| Model | `NovaSR.safetensors` | Model file to use |
| Unload Model | `False` | Keep model in VRAM for faster repeats |
| Show Spectrogram | `True` | Generate before/after comparison image |


## üìù Tips

1. **Mono Output:** NovaSR is mono-only. Use a mono-to-stereo node after if you need stereo
2. **Any Input:** Works with any sample rate - automatically resampled to 16kHz
3. **Stereo Handling:** Stereo inputs are automatically mixed to mono (average of channels)
4. **Batch Processing:** Model stays loaded for fast consecutive processing (unless "Unload Model" is checked)
5. **Real-time Use:** So fast it can enhance audio in real-time during recording or playback

## üîó Links

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Saganaki22/ComfyUI-NovaSR)
- [Models on HuggingFace](https://huggingface.co/drbaph/NovaSR)
- [Original NovaSR Repo](https://github.com/ysharma3501/NovaSR)
- [Original Paper](https://github.com/ysharma3501/NovaSR)

**NovaSR provides comparable quality at 1/1000th the size and 6000x faster than AudioSR!**
